articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Former U.S. President
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Former U.S. President 
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The personality of President Kim Il Sung as a great man was highly praised by former U.S. President Jimmy Carter.
					 Jimmy Carter recollected the time he was received by Kim Il Sung during his visit to the DPRK in 1994, when interviewed by the Thai newspaper "The Nation" on November 23.
					
					 He remembered President of the DPRK Kim Il Sung as a very outstanding great leader who was well versed in everything.
					
					 Having a very profound knowledge, Kim Il Sung knew almost everything, for example when a certain building was constructed and for what it was, he recalled, adding that he had a successful conversation with the President as he was simple and humble in his personality.
					
					 The President had been thoughtful of the north-south summit all the time until his demise, Carter said, expressing belief that there would be reconciliation between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 He expressed hope that the present U.S. administration would have a direct dialogue with the DPRK.
					
					 The account of Jimmy Carter's interview was reported by Reuters and Apsara Broadcasting Service of Cambodia on November 24.

articles.title: Vice-Chairwoman of CNPC on Sino-DPRK Friendship
articles.content:
Vice-Chairwoman of CNPC on Sino-DPRK Friendship
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The year of Sino-DPRK friendship will always remain recorded in the history, said Chen Zhili, vice-chairwoman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, when giving impressions of her visit to the DPRK.
					 This year is the year of Sino-DPRK friendship as it marked the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between China and the DPRK, she noted, and continued: 
					
					 The traditional Sino-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation were provided by Chairman Mao Zedong, the great leader of the Chinese people, and President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 Kim Il Sung was the great leader of the Korean people and a close friend of the Chinese people.
					
					 The Chinese people will never forget the exploits performed by him by making a great contribution to the Chinese revolution.
					
					 The Sino-DPRK relations are growing stronger as the days go by under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					President Hu Jintao and General Secretary Kim Jong Il jointly declared the beginning of the year of Sino-DPRK friendship on January 1 this year.
					
					 The functions held this year reconfirmed the unbreakable nature of the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties, two countries and two peoples forged through the struggle for their common cause.
					
					 I was deeply impressed to see the drive of the strong-willed and diligent Korean people, she said, and continued:
					
					 The Korean people are dynamically waging a 100-day campaign, united close around Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We are pleased with the fact that the Korean people have made great progress in the revolution and construction in the spirit of self-reliance and fortitude under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					We sincerely hope that the fraternal Korean people will register greater success in their efforts to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of
						 Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: New Film Produced
articles.content:
New Film Produced
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- A feature film "The Dream of the Red Mansions" (Parts 1 and 2) was produced by the Korean Film Studio.
					 The studio made a film version of the opera "The Dream of the Red Mansions" successfully re-created by the Phibada Opera Troupe as required by the new century by adapting it from a Chinese famous classic novel this year, the year of "DPRK-China friendship".
					
					 The film shows the ruin of an aristocratic family based on a patriarchal tradition, mainly dealing with the tragic love of its leading parts. It makes a truthful artistic depiction of what happened in feudal China which was on the verge of collapse and its inevitable downfall.

articles.title: S. Korea Accused of Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korea Accused of Escalating Confrontation with DPRK 
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppets sentenced the chairperson for information of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration to two years in prison, two years of suspension of qualification and four years of probation on charges of possessing MP3 file containing musical programs of the DPRK.
					 Commenting on this, a news analyst of Minju Joson Sunday observes:
					
					 This trial goes to prove that the "liberal democratic system" much touted by the puppets is nothing but a harsh fascist system which bans even freely listening to and singing songs and south Korea is the world's darkest society with the worst human rights record.
					
					 By doing so the puppets revealed before the world people their true colors as fascists and the truth behind their anti-DPRK human rights campaign.
					
					 The conservative ruling forces of south Korea are reacting to the broad-minded measures and sincere efforts of the DPRK for improving the inter-Korean relations by escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen. The above-said sentence is part of such confrontation moves. The puppets are abusing even musical programs for escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 It is their ulterior intention to mercilessly suppress anyone calling for implementing the north-south joint declaration and standing in the way of their anti-reunification moves in a bid to clear the hurdles lying in the way of the fascist rule and confrontation with fellow countrymen. The trial of the pregnant chairperson for information of the solidarity indicates what extent the fascist suppression of pro-reunification patriotic forces of south Korea has reached. Their escalated confrontation with fellow countrymen and intensified fascist suppression are by no means expedients for prolonging their remaining days but lead them to ruin, warns the news analyst.

articles.title: Judgment on Pro-reunification Organization Termed Unjust in S. Korea
articles.content:
Judgment on Pro-reunification Organization Termed Unjust in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of Struggle against Dictatorship of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea released a statement titled "Retract the labeling of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration as an enemy-benefiting organization'" on Dec. 2.
					 The statement accused the judicial authorities of staging a trial on Nov. 27 at which they labeled the solidarity as an "enemy-benefiting organization" and imposed penal servitudes, etc. upon its leading members.
					
					 Noting with irrepressible resentment that the "National Security Law" is unlimitedly applied for cracking down upon the forces of the reunification movement still today, the statement deplored that the reunification movement would be ceaselessly branded as an "illegal one" as long as this evil law remains in force. 
					
					 Demanding that the above-said labeling of the solidarity be lifted under any circumstances, the statement declared that the youth and students would wage a more dynamic anti-"government" struggle with extraordinary determination in order to achieve independent reunification and bring about progressive politics.

articles.title: Magazine Issued by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Magazine Issued by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China released the November issue of its magazine "Paektu-Halla".
					The magazine carried a photograph showing General Secretary Kim Jong Il greeting Wen Jiabao, premier of the State Council of China.
					
					 Given in it is news that an agreement and other agreed documents were signed between the governments of the DPRK and China.
					
					 It carried a photo-accompanied report that the association and organizations under it held a meeting and other functions to mark the 64th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The magazine under the title of "General Kim Jong Il's forced march for on-the-spot guidance" praised him for having led the all-people general advance for bringing about a new great revolutionary surge with his energetic Songun revolutionary leadership since the outset of the year.
					
					 It also carried a resolution titled "Let us open the gate to national reunification by preserving and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration!" and a special statement titled "The Japanese authorities should make a sincere apology to our people for the crimes committed by Japan in the past and redeem them, " both adopted at a meeting of overseas compatriots for preserving and implementing the above-said declarations.
